full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA BRTEN NAS BU'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BLANG BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHES RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA BRTEN NAS BU'I GA-YANG 'GUGS RIN CHEN LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DZA HA CHEN GUN THOG THU PA THUS DNGUL GYI MAndAL KHA BTAGS DANG BCAS PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BU 'DOD PA NI BU THOB GYUR ZHING ZHES PA GZHUNG YOD PA'I PHYIN AEL LA GOG SANG HU THUG THU MER GEN PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI NOM CHI THO'ING GU SHRI SLOB DPON BLO BZANG RGYAL MCHOG PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, 'GRO BA RNAMS KYI GNAS SKABS SU DGOS 'DOD 'GRUB CING MTHAR THUG SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: AEL LA GOG SANG HU THUG THU MER GEN PAndI TA,
